column41: The MOD is currently at the Planning Round stage of implementing the 2012/13 budget. Payroll and Non-Payroll figures required for this return are taken from the MOD's Planning, Budgeting & Forecasting (PB&F) system. Until the PR12 process is complete and costed plans are migrated to PB&F, the financial information due to be published here is not centrally available.
